feature1.title: You Gain Performance
feature1.description: You visualize your study plan, which is made according to your time availability and your needs.

feature2.title: You Gain Precision
feature2.description: Using Hermann Ebbinghaus' technique, you can review the content at the right time, avoiding the forgetting curve.

feature3.title: Track Your Progress
feature3.description: Track your progress and see how you're improving in your studies.

feature4.title: Get Immediate Results
feature4.description: The results come quickly, as your time and calendar are already organized based on the most efficient study techniques.

step1.title: Create your account
step1.description: Create an account if you are an Enem, Contest, or College student, or if you are a teacher. The prices are affordable, like buying a snack on iFood for your study afternoon, and the platform is lifetime access.

step2.title: Register your study topics
step2.description: Your study topics are the contents you want to study. You can register as many topics as you want. The system will organize your studies, and you can study more efficiently, including spaced revisions.

step3.title: Study with the platform
step3.description: We want you to perform at your best and succeed in your studies. Thatâ€™s why the platform is designed to be with you all the time, using standard methods like 24x7x30 & 24x3x7 & 24x3x15. You always know when to study because we will notify you by email, WhatsApp, Telegram, or any other communication method you prefer, so you don't miss any revision.
